title: Biological Processes
description: Microbial growth kinetics and bioenergetics, theory, modeling, and application of biological processes employed in water, wastewater, and hazardous waste treatment systems as well as subsurface bioremediation.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: CEE 6310 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and CEE 6311 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and CEE 6312 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
